name: Stronger Together (Spuggiehawk)
description:
Sometimes, long lasting and successful partnerships need to be maintained.

Drag and drop pieces onto the play area.  Click them to rotate them in place.  Mismatched pieces won't fit together on the grid, so if you're sure the latest one is correct, try moving the blocking piece first.

Save your progress and it will automatically reload when you play again.  To reset a partially or fully completed puzzle, just hit the reset button.

This game was originally designed to run as a WebGL application in a browser, but I couldn't get it working on itch.io.  Here is a link to the web version on my own server:
